channel.title: Math, need both done, and minimum 6hours of sleep, both wont work
channel.description:
I need sleep, because I am taking a lot of tests tomarow(4 days of school left ;D)
However, I have worked on homework for 6 hours so far, and I need sleep or else I will be worse off, so please help me.
I was gone for 4 days for state competitions, I am going to nationals in chicago for getting third in Intro. to technology concepts. and I have math, language arts, and science to make up in. I can handle science(got 2 more days to turn in) and I have finished language arts(must be turned in Tomarow morning) I am bobbing my head at the moment, whilst I type, and this must be turned in tomarow as well. yet I do not have time. this is a simple review and would be easy for those past 9th grade(a majority I think). so just help me by doing 2-4 questions each please.. I need help, and I do not want to ruin my GPA right at the end of the year..
Page 1: [img]http://www.kloplop321.com/apics/page1.jpg[/img]
Page 2: [img]http://www.kloplop321.com/apics/page2.jpg[/img]
showing your work would be appreciated..(slumps over) sorry if it is a bit big, I just installed my old* scanner
but you cannot complain about low quality and unable to read. thanks for everyone that does help. I truely need at the moment. I need to sleep, thanks people ;)
*year 1996 [br][size=1]Posted on: May 15, 2007, 09:44:11 PM[/size][hr]I gess nobody could do simple math over the night.. I really hope I can get this done

@kloplop321 wrote:

well i was tired, majorly (couldn’t walk strait). and it is too late anyway… I turned it in unfinished because no one helped(I for a few of them done)
